thread.title: Danny Welbeck shock admission: When I was at Mancester United I hated this Arsenal ace
thread.title_full: Danny Welbeck shock admission: When I was at Mancester United I hated this Arsenal ace

title: Danny Welbeck shock admission: When I was at Mancester United I hated this Arsenal ace
text:
Danny Welbeck shock admission: When I was at Mancester United I hated this Arsenal ace DANNY WELBECK admits he used to hate Arsenal team-mate Kieran Gibbs. PUBLISHED: 14:40, Thu, Feb 23, 2017 | UPDATED: 14:58, Thu, Feb 23, 2017 GETTY Danny Welbeck admits he used to hate Kieran Gibbs 
They came up against each other in 2007 in the FA Youth Cup when Welbeck was at Manchester United . 
And the striker admits being unable to get the better of Gibbs in the first leg left him frustrated. 
"It was the first time we prepared like it was a first team match," Welbeck said. GETTY Danny Welbeck and Kieran Gibbs came up against each in 2007 GETTY Danny Welbeck was frustrated by Kieran Gibbs back in 2007 
"It was a special moment. Obviously me and Gibbo are very close friends now but back then I used to hate him to be honest. 
"He was bigger than me, faster than me, he was so strong and I was like, â€˜what is this guy about?'. 
"He scored the first goal at the Emirates. The second leg was at Old Trafford and I scored the winner to knock Arsenal out." GETTY Kieran Gibbs celebrates with Danny Welbeck on England duty Danny Welbeck celebrates first Arsenal goals after injury Sat, January 28, 2017 Click through the gallery for the best snaps of Danny Welbeck's 'salt bae' celebration for Arsenal against Southampton
